item.title: About Me
item.description:
I’m someone who’s curious about astrophysics, tech and highly interested in social justice and climate change. This portfolio mostly consists of my techie side, with a hint of other stuff as well in an (as you’ve already figured out) extremely informal tone.

Considering my heavy curiosity towards Tech, mathematics and my sheer passion for astrophysics since childhood, I’ve tilted my career towards RTL Design. I’ve tasted a lil bit of everything I could during my undergrad (Linux, android application Reverse engineering, RTL Design, Computer Architecture, pure mathematics), and my list of ‘Stuff I love’ only grew as I explored more.

item.title: Contact Me
item.description: You can contact me via Email or LinkedIn. I usually respond within a few hours. I can’t guarantee about insta DMs tho :)

item.title: Experience
item.description: I’m currently working as an FPGA Developer, exploring various ways and applications of reconfigurable edge ML acceleration. I’m also very passionate about Linux and computer architecture in general. The whole flow of data from compilers to memory drives via the processor with an assembler, all done by tiny-ass transistors and funny lines on a green board is extremely fascinating for me.
